text: “Soni kumbuchilani ndema jawam'bisile jenumanja kuwa wawinjila panyuma pa achina Adi, ni antaamiiche ndamo jambone pachilambo, nkulitawila majumba gamakulungwakulungwa muiwata yakwe, soni ni nkusepa m’matumbi majumba, basi kumbuchilani indimba ya Allah, ni nkalapwaga pachilambo pakuwatanganya.”
